snippet: “I’m feeling really lucky in Las Vegas, Ken” — Hillary Rodham Clinton to Kenneth Rigmaiden, the president of the International Union of Painters and Allied Trades, after the group endorsed her on Wednesday at a training complex in Henderson,...
abstract: “I’m feeling really lucky in Las Vegas, Ken” — Hillary Rodham Clinton to Kenneth Rigmaiden, the president of the International Union of Painters and Allied Trades, after the group endorsed her on Wednesday at a training complex in Henderson, Nev.

headline.main: Verbatim: Hillary Clinton Picks Up Labor Group’s Endorsement
